<style>
        .contant{
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1280px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        /* ug_bundles */
        .ug_bundles{
            background: #FFF5D3;
            padding: 22px 0;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box{
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box > div:nth-child(1){
            
            border-right: 1px solid #F58720;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item{
            width: 50%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 8px 50px;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .left{
            text-align: center;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .left p{
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 44px;
            line-height: 44px;
            color: #FF8818;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .left span{
            font-size: 20px;
            color: #333333;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .right{
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .right p{
            font-size: 20px;
            color: #FF8818;
            margin: 0;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .right .copy-btn{
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 10px 30px;
            background: #FFFFFF;
            border: 1px solid #FF8818;
            border-radius: 100px;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 16px;
            color: #FF8818;
            margin: 0 0 0 20px;
        }
        .ug_bundles_box .item .right .copy-btn:hover{
            background: #FF8818;
            color: #FFFFFF;
        }
        /* svg_title */
        .svg_title{
        padding: 120px 0 40px 0;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .svg_title svg{
        display: inline-block;
        width: 1.875vw;
        height: 1.875vw;
    }
    .svg_title h2{
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 1.875vw;
        color: #000000;
        padding: 0.521vw 0 0.78125vw 0;
        line-height: 2.083vw;
    }
    .svg_title h2 span{
        font-weight: 700;
    }
    .svg_title p{
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 1.042vw;
        color: #666666;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 1.042vw;
    }
    .svg_title p button{ 
        color: #FF8818;
        background: none;
        padding: 0;
        font-size: 1.042vw;
    }
    /* details */
    .details_box .section_box{
        max-width: 960px;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }
    .details_box{
        padding: 100px 0;
        background: #F5F5F7;
    }
    .details_box h2{
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 30px;
        color: #000000;
        margin-bottom: 40px;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .details_box li{
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 30px;
        color: #666666;
        list-style: disc;
    }
    .details_box li button{
        color: #FF8818;
        background: none;
        padding: 0;
        font-size: 1.042vw;
    }
    </style>
